name: Marble Man Platformer
description:
Marble Man is on a quest to collect 15 marbles in each round to allow him to be more shiny.

Features
  • Infinite Level Generation - Continue playing for as long as you can manage.
  • Randomness - Go further to face a greater challenge.
  • Global Laderboard - The fastest time makes it.
  • Customize - Give Marble Man a fresh new shiny colour.
  • Rounds - Replay rounds or continue in your struggle.
  • Sound Effects - Marbles clanking and hip-hop loop.
  • Shoot - Throw marbles.
  • Run - Move faster to get a faster time.

Trailer
